means: [医]弗洛伊德〔学说〕的：关于弗洛伊德心理学说和心理疗法（精神分析学说和方法）的
弗洛伊德精神分析法的，（尤指性方面）表示出内心思想感情的

word_mean: 弗洛伊德〔学说〕的：关于弗洛伊德心理学说和心理疗法(精神分析学说和方法)的
拥护或应用弗洛伊德学说或方法的人

sentence.Network_en: He was a strict, old-school Freudian.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个不折不扣、传统守旧的弗洛伊德学说信奉者。

sentence.Network_en: 'I've never loved, I mean I've never stopped loving, my mother. '' Was that a Freudian slip?'
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我从没爱过, 我是说我从没停止爱过我母亲. ” “这是口误,还是你的真实想法? ”

sentence.Network_en: The Freudian theory about daughters falling in love with their father has little evidence to support it.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗洛伊德关于女儿恋父的理论缺乏依据。

entry.tran: 弗洛伊德的;(尤指有关潜意识性情感的)弗洛伊德学说(或实践)的
entry.def: Freudian means relating to the ideas and methods of the psychiatrist Freud, especially to his ideas about people's subconscious sexual feelings.

example.ex: ...the Freudian theory about daughters falling in love with their father.
example.tran: 有关女儿恋父情结的弗洛伊德理论

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to Sigmund Freud or his psychoanalytic ideas;

auth_sentence.content: Nevertheless, we have profited from Freudian ideas.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nevertheless, we have profited from Freudian ideas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nevertheless, we have profited from Freudian ideas.

auth_sentence.content: There was something Freudian about my forgetfulness.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was something Freudian about my forgetfulness.

auth_sentence.content: Rest assured that was a typo, not a Freudian slip.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rest assured that was a typo, not a Freudian slip.
